verses.verse: He who dashes in pieces <S%H6327><s%> has come up <S%H5927><s%> against you. <S%H6440><s%> Keep <S%H5341><s%> the fortress! <S%H4694><s%> Watch <S%H6822><s%> the way! <S%H1870><s%> Strengthen <S%H2388><s%> your waist! <S%H4975><s%> Fortify <S%H553><s%> your power <S%H3581><s%> mightily! <S%H3966><s%>

For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> restores <S%H7725><s%> the excellency <S%H1347><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> as the excellency <S%H1347><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> for the destroyers <S%H1238><s%> have destroyed <S%H1238><s%> them, <S%H7843><s%> and ruined their vine branches. <S%H2156><s%>

The shield <S%H4043><s%> of his mighty men <S%H1368><s%> is made red. <S%H119><s%> The valiant <S%H2428><s%> men <S%H582><s%> are in scarlet. <S%H8529><s%> The chariots <S%H7393><s%> flash <S%H784><s%> with steel <S%H6393><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of his preparation, <S%H3559><s%> and the pine spears <S%H1265><s%> are brandished. <S%H7477><s%>

The chariots <S%H7393><s%> rage <S%H1984><s%> in the streets. <S%H2351><s%> They rush <S%H8264><s%> back and forth in the broad ways. <S%H7339><s%> Their appearance <S%H4758><s%> is like torches. <S%H3940><s%> They run <S%H7323><s%> like the lightnings. <S%H1300><s%>

He summons <S%H2142><s%> his picked troops. <S%H117><s%> They stumble <S%H3782><s%> on their way. <S%H1979><s%> They dash <S%H4116><s%> to its wall, <S%H2346><s%> and the protective shield <S%H5526><s%> is put in place. <S%H3559><s%>
The gates <S%H8179><s%> of the rivers <S%H5104><s%> are opened, <S%H6605><s%> and the palace <S%H1964><s%> is dissolved. <S%H4127><s%>

It is decreed: <S%H5324><s%> she is uncovered, <S%H1540><s%> she is carried away; <S%H5927><s%> and her handmaids <S%H519><s%> moan <S%H5090><s%> as with the voice <S%H6963><s%> of doves, <S%H3123><s%> beating <S%H8608><s%> on their breasts. <S%H3824><s%>

But Nineveh <S%H5210><s%> has been from of old <S%H3117><s%> like a pool <S%H1295><s%> of water, <S%H4325><s%> yet they flee away. <S%H5127><s%> "Stop! <S%H5975><s%> Stop! <S%H5975><s%>" they cry, <S%H6437><s%> but no one looks back.

Take the spoil <S%H962><s%> of silver. <S%H3701><s%> Take the spoil <S%H962><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> for there is no end <S%H7097><s%> of the store, <S%H8498><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of all goodly <S%H2532><s%> furniture. <S%H3627><s%>

She is empty, <S%H950><s%> void, <S%H4003><s%> and waste. <S%H1110><s%> The heart <S%H3820><s%> melts, <S%H4549><s%> the knees <S%H1290><s%> knock together, <S%H6375><s%> their <S%H2479><s%> bodies <S%H4975><s%> and faces <S%H6440><s%> have grown <S%H6908><s%> pale. <S%H6289><s%>

Where is the den <S%H4583><s%> of the lions, <S%H738><s%> and the feeding place <S%H4829><s%> of the young lions, <S%H3715><s%> where the lion <S%H738><s%> and the lioness <S%H738><s%> walked, <S%H1980><s%> the lion <S%H3833><s%>'s cubs, <S%H1482><s%> and no one made them afraid? <S%H2729><s%>

The lion <S%H738><s%> tore in pieces <S%H2963><s%> enough <S%H1767><s%> for his cubs, <S%H1484><s%> and strangled <S%H2614><s%> for his lionesses, <S%H3833><s%> and filled <S%H4390><s%> his caves <S%H2356><s%> with the kill, <S%H2964><s%> and his dens <S%H4585><s%> with prey. <S%H2964><s%>

"Behold, <S%H5002><s%> I am against you," says Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> "and I will burn <S%H1197><s%> her chariots <S%H7393><s%> in the smoke, <S%H6227><s%> and the sword <S%H2719><s%> will devour <S%H398><s%> your young lions; <S%H3715><s%> and I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> your prey <S%H2964><s%> from the earth, <S%H776><s%> and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of your messengers <S%H4397><s%> will no longer be heard. <S%H8085><s%>"
